# Introduction

```{r read, echo=TRUE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, error=FALSE}
library(readr)
library(knitr)
library(tidyr)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(formattable)

avengers <- read_csv('../data/avengers/avengers.csv')
```

## Inspecting the Datasets {.tabset .tabset-fade .tabset-pills}

###Avengers
```{r head_avengers}
knitr::kable(head(avengers,10),caption="Avengers List (first 10 rows)")
```

###Avengers Summary
```{r summary_avengers}
summary(avengers)
```

###Avengers Structure
```{r glimpse_avengers}
glimpse(avengers)
```
